Ref: CXP018/2023
Closing date: 27 January 2023

To assist in the smooth, successful running of the company. Determine objectives and ensure achievement of targets to ensure high quality service and products for better performance.

Location: Jacobs, Bluff

Main Duties include:

-Delegate duties to staff members to ensure staff are efficiently engaged, discipline of staff members, assist with the hiring and training of staff members.

-Merchandising and layout of shop floor and monthly front shop changes. Assist in managing shop maintenance, management of stock levels on the floor and security of the store.

-Authorizing credits and cash refunds, booking in of stock and monitoring and enforcing company policies related to staff

-Supervision of bulk store to ensure stores are always properly organized, stock is correctly stored, and stores are kept clean and tidy.

-Supervise all staff in the operations department, including picking, prepacking, packaging and barcoding with emphasis on accuracy and time management.

-Manage the reports from the operations department daily

Salary Range: R30 000 – R35 000

Criteria:

-Relevant Qualification in Management or similar discipline

-2-5 years relevant experience

-Supervisory Skills and Organizational Skills

-Good product and system knowledge
